nodes.documentation:
Recommended interface for public facing minting and burning functions.
These public methods should have restricted access.
nodes.name: IERC1155MintBurn
mint
batchMint
burn
batchBurn

nodes.documentation:
Recommended interface for public facing minting and burning functions.
These public methods should have restricted access.
nodes.name: IERC1155MintBurn
mint
batchMint
burn
batchBurn

params._amounts: Array of the amount to be burned
params._from: The address to burn tokens from
params._ids: Array of token ids to burn

batchMint(address,uint256[],uint256[],by.details: Mint tokens for each ids in _ids

params._amounts: Array of amount of tokens to mint per id
params._data: Byte array of data to pass to recipient if it's a contract
params._to: The address to mint tokens to.

params._from: The address to burn tokens from

mint(address,uint256,uint256,bytes).details: Mint _amount of tokens of a given id if not frozen and if max supply not exceeded

params._data: Byte array of data to pass to recipient if it's a contract
params._to: The address to mint tokens to.

batchBurn(address,uint256[],uint256[]).notice: Burn tokens of given token id for each (_ids[i], _amounts[i]) pair

burn(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Burn _amount of tokens of a given token id

userdoc.notice: Recommended interface for public facing minting and burning functions. These public methods should have restricted access.
